testcase.name: Excluir um reserva com sucesso
testcase.system-out: * url "https://treinamento-api.herokuapp.com" ............................. passed * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * header Authorization = 'Basic YWRtaW46cGFzc3dvcmQxMjM=' ................. passed * def book = call read('../utils/criarReserva.feature') ................... passed * def bookingId = book.response.bookingid ................................. passed Given path 'booking', bookingId ........................................... passed When method DELETE ........................................................ passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed
